snippet.title: Title: The Gemini Planet Imager: First Light

snippet.title: Title: Ribbons characterize magnetohydrodynamic magnetic fields better than lines: a lesson from dynamo theory
snippet.description:
Title: Ribbons characterize magnetohydrodynamic magnetic fields better than lines: a lesson from dynamo theory

Comments: 11 pages, 10 figure panels, submitted to MNRAS
Subjects: Solar and Stellar Astrophysics (astro-ph.SR); Cosmology and Nongalactic Astrophysics (astro-ph.CO); Astrophysics of Galaxies (astro-ph.GA); High Energy Astrophysical Phenomena (astro-ph.HE); Plasma Physics (physics.plasm-ph)
